meanings.sent1: She prefaced her speech with a brief introduction.
meanings.sent2: He always prefaced his stories with a funny joke.
meanings.sent3: The teacher prefaced the lesson with a fun fact to grab the students' attention.
meanings.sent4: The chef prefaced the main course with a delightful appetizer.
meanings.sent5: The book was prefaced with a touching dedication to the author's family.

meanings.sent1: The prologue prefaced the thrilling adventure that followed.
meanings.sent2: The introduction prefaced the detailed explanation of the topic.
meanings.sent3: The appetizer prefaced the delicious meal that awaited the guests.
meanings.sent4: The opening act prefaced the main performance of the evening.
meanings.sent5: The warm-up exercises prefaced the intense workout session.
